text: (Hamra) rasulale tyasa kurama imana lya'unu bhayo juna unimathi allahako tarphabata utariyo ra mominaharule pani imana lya'e, yiniharusabai allaha, usaka pharistaharu, usaka kitabaharu ra usaka paigambaraharumathi imana lya'e. Hami usaka paigambaraharumadhye kasaiko bica bhedabhavako vyavahara gardainaum, uniharule bhane ki hamile sun'yau ra man'yau hamile ksamako lagi prarthana gardachaum. He palanakarta! Ra timi che'u nai pharkera janu cha
